checkbox.label: All_QuantityPurchased
checkbox.title: Product units purchased.
checkbox.virtual: if (P1_Total_Products.val==0): All_QuantityPurchased.r0.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==1): All_QuantityPurchased.r1.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==2): All_QuantityPurchased.r2.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==3): All_QuantityPurchased.r3.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==4): All_QuantityPurchased.r4.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==5): All_QuantityPurchased.r5.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==6): All_QuantityPurchased.r6.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==7): All_QuantityPurchased.r7.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==8): All_QuantityPurchased.r8.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==9): All_QuantityPurchased.r9.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val==10): All_QuantityPurchased.r10.val=1 if (P1_Total_Products.val >10): All_QuantityPurchased.r11.val=1

number.label: Units_BoughtPerProduct_All
number.title: Quantity Purchased Per Product.
number.virtual: for x in P1_Number_Bought_Per_Product.rows: Units_BoughtPerProduct_All[x].val = P1_Number_Bought_Per_Product[x].val
